extendedInfo.description: The UNA app for Android phones is the perfect companion for students. Catch up with campus news, events, and videos; look up email addresses & phone numbers; get directions from the campus map; see your class schedule, class roster, and check assignments, discussions, and grades using our Angel integration.

reviews.title: I may only use it once a semester...
reviews.comment: But it is invaluable for remembering which classes you go to on the first day. No longer am I tied to the yoke of my planner!
reviews.author: Erica Oman

reviews.title: Horrible..
reviews.comment: Worst excuse for an app. Can only view basic class info (room, instructor, time), a poorly formatted events calendar, and little else. App will also keep running in background - even if not previously opened - and frequently stops responding when doing so, prompting me with a \"UNA has stopped responding and must close\" while I\'m typing up an email on gmail or perusing some other unrelated app. Judging from its performance, UNA\'s initial app budget was about $1.50.
reviews.author: Jessica Collingwood

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Those wanting email integration... Just use your email app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Can\'t do anything usefull! No email or a way to check assignments.
reviews.author: Trevor Valentine

reviews.title: No E-mail
reviews.comment: I love the app, but I really wish I could check my E-mail. Include that and this would be a 5 star app easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UNA
reviews.comment: Nice work, very useful....add email option and this will be 5 stars!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: USEFUL APP!
reviews.comment: I was wondering when UNA was going to get an app! Very useful! Only problem is that on my Android phone everytime I press assignments, the app foreclosed. Would very much like it if we could get to our portal from there as well !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Email
reviews.comment: The app is useful, but adding a feature that would allow students to check their UNA email from the app would be perfect! An update with this feature would get 5 stars, easy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it.
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to see course material and email
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Wish it would let us check our email!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tablet
reviews.comment: Not compatible with tablets when can we see this happen
reviews.author: A Google User
